titleStmt.title: The country lawyers maid Joan, containing her languishing lamentation for want of a man, which at length she met with, being her masters man Mark. Tune of Turn coat of the times. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, and J. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
